name: Bionico Mexican Fruit Salad (Vegan)
description: This Bionico Mexican Fruit Salad is a refreshing, satisfying, and perfectly sweet and creamy breakfast or special treat
recipeIngredient: 1 cup Pineapple, peeled, cut into cubes
1 cup Papapaya, peeled, cut into cubes
1 cup Orange, peeled, cut into cubes
1/2 cup Banana, ripe, sliced into rounds

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients for the yogurt in the blender. Process until completely smooth. Pour into a container, set aside and refrigerate for 15 minutes. (It will thicken slightly in the refrigerator.)
recipeInstructions.name: Place all of the ingredients for the yogurt in the blender. Process until completely smooth. Pour into a container, set aside and refrigerate for 15 minutes. (It will thicken slightly in the refrigerator.)

recipeInstructions.text: Begin layering your fruit into a cup or bowl, by alternating with 1 tbsp. of almond yogurt, until you have filled your cup ¾ of the way.
recipeInstructions.name: Begin layering your fruit into a cup or bowl, by alternating with 1 tbsp. of almond yogurt, until you have filled your cup ¾ of the way.

recipeInstructions.text: Top the fruit and yogurt with granola and shredded coconut.
recipeInstructions.name: Top the fruit and yogurt with granola and shredded coconut.

keywords: bionico fruit salad, mexican fruit salad
